query: SELECT name, `spotType`, difficulty, description, `bestSeason` FROM activity_spots WHERE `islandGuideId` IN (SELECT id FROM island_guides WHERE name LIKE '%Thulusdhoo%') ORDER BY name;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT name, `spotType`, difficulty, description, `bestSeason` FROM activity_spots WHERE `islandGuideId` IN (SELECT id FROM island_guides WHERE name LIKE '%Thulusdhoo%') ORDER BY name;
